## Marginal relationships do not reveal everything

```{r}
n <- 100
p <- 4

x <- rnorm(n * p)
X <- cbind(1, x)
errors <- rnorm(n)
betas <- runif(p + 1, -2, 2)
y <- X %*% beta + errors
```
